page.title: 07THE EXE ESTUARY
page.content: The{Exe}begins in{Exmoor}and runs through places like{Exeter,Topsham, {Tiverton,Starcross,Dawlish Warren, {Lympstone}and{Exmouth}where it flows into the sea.The{Exe}is one of the foremost wildlife sites in the{South {West,}it is a place of special scientific importance.Between{Exmoor and{Exmouth}it spreads out its mudflats and sandbanks.The{Exe}spreads over miles of land.The{Exe}is used by tourists,industry and nature.The{Exe has many tourist attractions like fishing,bird watching and a ferry service from{Exmouth}to{Starcross.}For anglers there is fishing.For bird watchers it is possible to observe sea birds.The{Exe Estuary}is also a place for recreation like sailing,canoeing, windsurfing,swimming and many other sports and activities.
